'''Bridget''' is a woman Sam met at the gym.

==History==
When Sam and Sheldon went to the gym to try to pick up women, Bridget approached Sam. Sam thought she was interested in him and introduced himself, but she just asked if he was done with the bike he was on because there was a time limit on cardio equipment.
